about_the_game:
Description

"Megis Adventure" is an open-world retro RPG pixel game. You find yourself on a distant, isolated island, embarking on an adventure to uncover mysteries, defeat foes, and explore dungeons—all to help the island's citizens. The story is simple yet fun, filled with surprises that lead to an enjoyable and immersive gameplay experience.

History

"Megis Adventure" was developed by a solo developer in early 2023. The project is entirely independent, allowing for a focus on pure, fun gameplay as envisioned by the developer. It is ad-free and does not include in-app purchases, with all future updates provided free of charge to anyone who purchases the game, and the developer is committed to maintaining this policy.

Where Retro Meets Modern: Discover Megis Adventure!

Dive into a captivating blend of retro pixel art and modern gameplay mechanics. This open-world experience invites you to create your character, level up, and craft an array of unique items. Explore dungeons and islands, complete engaging quests, and uncover hidden areas—all while enjoying the nostalgic charm of classic gaming infused with contemporary innovations. Get ready for a unique adventure that beautifully marries the old and the new!

Features

🌍 Available in 26 Languages!

🎮 Retro Pixel Art: Experience nostalgic gameplay with charming old-school pixel art!

🏙️ Lively Open World: Explore diverse buildings, NPCs, islands, and zones!

🌾 Build Your Farm: Plant, water, grow, and harvest a variety of crops!

🐄 Raise Animals: Engage in animal husbandry by raising cows, pigs, sheep, and chickens!

🌱 Cultivate a Thriving Greenhouse: Create a greenhouse for growing mushrooms and a variety of plants!

⚔️ Dungeon Action: Navigate traps, defeat monsters, and conquer bosses!

📜 Epic Quests: Embark on a journey filled with hundreds of quests to complete, each offering unique challenges and adventures!

🌟 Customize Your Playstyle: Build your talent tree from 27 unique talent options!

🛡️ Strengthen Your Character: Unlock passive bonuses and progress in levels, professions, and equipment!

🗝️ Collect Rare Artifacts: Gather rare artifacts to use at the Relic Altar and gain unique passive buffs!

🏅 Increase Your Reputation: Level up your reputation with various NPCs to unlock unique items and bonuses!

🌲 Resource Gathering: Chop wood, mine stone, and fish for over 100 unique species!

🛠️ Craft, Brew, and Cook: Collect materials and create your own items!

💰 Trade and Unlock Items: Hundreds of items and consumables to buy, with new ones unlocked as you level up!

🐹 Friendly Pets: Unlock pets to join you on your adventures!

🔮 Choose Your Class: Pick from four classes: Swashbuckler, Beast Master, Sorcerer, and the Bard, which unlocks as you progress through the game!

📖 Engaging Story: Follow a captivating narrative with rich lore!

🗺️ Hand-Designed World: Immerse yourself in a richly crafted fantasy world, meticulously designed for a captivating open-world experience!

Start your epic adventure!
Dive into the pixel RPG open world of "Megis Adventure" today!

Available in 26 Languages:
English, Spanish, Portuguese, Bulgarian, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Latvian, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Swedish, Romanian, Ukrainian, Norwegian, Dutch, Amharic, Hindi, Russian, Turkish.

"Megis Adventure promises to bring hours of exciting entertainment." - 2Game
"Megis Adventure: An RPG in the spirit of The Legend of Zelda." - App-Time

No ads, no in-app purchases.
Supports USB controllers (keyboard required for text input).
